column2: We are only getting further from our destination.
The seismic activity has lessened to a manageable degree.
Lads, we can pick any direction, but we need to pick one!
Maybe we can take that valley instead!
Through the lows or the highs, we matter not.
Is there a route that looks safer for us to take, because safety comes first!
This is a waste, going back and forth like this.
